  java.nio.channels.spi.AbstractInterruptibleChannel
      java.nio.channels.FileChannel
������ʵ�ֵĽӿڣ�

extends AbstractInterruptibleChannel
implements ByteChannel, GatheringByteChannel, ScatteringByteChannel
